title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
description: Master AI concepts, neural networks, and practical ML applications using TensorFlow and Python.

title: Data Science with Python
description: Learn data analysis, visualization, and predictive modeling with Python, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Understand network security, ethical hacking, and threat mitigation techniques.

title: UI/UX Design Mastery
description: Create user-friendly interfaces with Figma, focusing on design principles and prototyping.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Explore cloud architecture, deployment, and AWS services like EC2 and S3.

title: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Build modern web apps with React, Node.js, and MongoDB from scratch.
